meanings.definition: A circle that passes through all the vertices of a polygon.
meanings.sent1: The circumcircle of the triangle touched each vertex perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The mathematician drew the circumcircle around the polygon to solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: The circus performer balanced on the circumcircle of the polygon, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like a circumcircle around the room, reaching every corner.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the circumcircle made it stand out against the white background.

meanings.definition: The circle that circumscribes a triangle.
meanings.sent1: The circumcircle of the triangle was drawn with a compass.
meanings.sent2: The circumcircle neatly enclosed the entire triangle within its boundary.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the mouse hiding inside the circumcircle of the triangle.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a warm embrace within the circumcircle of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The circumcircle of the triangle glowed in the sunlight, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The circle that contains a polygon.
meanings.sent1: The circumcircle of the polygon was carefully calculated by the architect.
meanings.sent2: The circumcircle expanded to encompass the entire polygon within its curve.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran around the circumcircle of the polygon, playing a game of chase.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness enveloped everyone around her like a warm circumcircle of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The circumcircle of the polygon shone brightly under the moonlight, illuminating the area.
